ygData.subject: Tinkered pets, Fact or Fiction?  next on Springer
ygData.msgSnippet: guys the recipe is for a level 8 pet, now I know how unbalancing that would be to have a level 50 wizard with a level 8 pet cause damn that pet could dish out
ygData.messageBody:
guys the recipe is for a level 8 pet, now I know how unbalancing that would be
to have a level 50 wizard with a level 8 pet cause damn that pet could dish out
some heinous damage 8-12 points of damage per swing and it could take two whole
hits, assuming the creature actually attacks it and doesn't accidently riposte
it to death. To get your hopes up even higher the large power module lets you
create a level 16 pet, OHHH THE POWER I HOLD WITHIN MY HANDS!!!!! it's novelty
for people is all but trust me as soon as I find the recipe you will see the
first warrior with a pet.

On what someone else said about enchanters, Animations don't count as pets so
the creature dubbed "evil eye pet" is actually an animation not a pet, they
just screwed up when the text wrote it

Efrieum
Level 35 warrior
gonna have a pet and gonna name it Binky
